TopicTitle: MPS Nautilus - Voyage to the planets

Articles.Content:
Hello! This is thread for mission called "Nautilus"(yes,it is created mainly from MPS Nautilus from BobCat).It is mission to get to as many planets as possible,and return to Kerbin.As always,there is a risk of not succeeding,but I will take the risk,and I will travel to many planets with detailed log!The mission has started 9th of August when I wanted to use the MPS Nautilus from BobCat,but then realised that I have Kethane installed and that I can possibly do grand tour.And no,this is WITHOUT any story elements,it's just my log.

It has:

2x Reusable one man Low G lander

2x low G or atmospheric lander

4x CubeSat's *

*small sattelites which will monitor any planet or moon

Mission Emblem/Flag

MPS Nautilus at low Kerbin orbit

Edited August 10, 2013 by EvilotionCR2
Added picture of Nautilus

We launch a correct crew members and orbit Minmus so we can mine Kethane! I launched 2 new crewmembers of the Nautilus,because the two I launched with the rest,DIDN'T HAD THE STUPIDITY FACTOR AT MAX!

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Edited August 10, 2013 by EvilotionCR2
Finnaly got the album to work!

Bad news.When I tried to land on the surface of the Minmus with my kethane lander,I found that I was using the wrong version of the Kethane so I could not deploy drills.After installing the new version of the Kethane,the part names changed,so it could not load the craft files,so,I have to rebuild MPS Nautilus again...
